pages.title: Dragon Scale Armor
pages.text: Dragon scale armor is a new set of armor obtained by Butchering the End Dragon. This set is not easy to come by and can take multiple dragons to make a complete set. To craft this set you must upgrade netherite armor with $(l:butchery:items/dragon_smithing_template)Dragon Smithing Templates$() and $(l:butchery:resources/dragon_scale)Dragon Scale Ingots$() in a smithing table.
